TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit CustomAttributeExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class CustomAttributeExtensions abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Contains static methods for retrieving custom attributes.
Retrieves a custom attribute that is applied to a specified element.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Attribute GetCustomAttribute (this System.Reflection.Assembly element, Type attributeType);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Attribute GetCustomAttribute(class System.Reflection.Assembly element, class System.Type attributeType) cil managed

static member GetCustomAttribute : System.Reflection.Assembly * Type -> Attribute

Docs.param: The type of attribute to search for.
Docs.summary: Retrieves a custom attribute of a specified type that is applied to a specified assembly.
Docs.returns: A custom attribute that matches , or if no such attribute is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttributes%2A> extension method if you expect more than one value to be returned, or <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException> will be thrown.

Docs.exception: More than one of the requested attributes was found.
